{{cpp/experimental/reflect/title|GlobalScope}}
{{cpp/experimental/reflect/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=reflection_ts | header=experimental/reflect | 1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept GlobalScope = Namespace&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; /* see below */;
}}

The {{tt|GlobalScope}} concept is satisfied if and only if T reflects the global namespace (Note: Any such T does not satisfy {{tt|ScopeMember}}).
